# seconds(forHostTime:)

**Type Method**

Converts host time to seconds.

## Declaration

```swift
class func seconds(forHostTime hostTime: UInt64) -> TimeInterval
```

## Parameters

- **hostTime**: The host time.

## Return Value

The number of seconds that represent the host time you specify.

## Manipulating Host Time

- **hostTime**: The host time.
- **isHostTimeValid**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the host time value is valid.
- **hostTime(forSeconds:)**: Converts seconds to host time.
